--- title: "{{< iconify line-md monitor-mutlple >}} Welcome to the DigIQ Monitor" format: html ---
Welcome to the DigIQ Monitor, providing recent insights into the digital competence of Dutch citizens aged 10â€“100!
This dashboard aggregates data collected using the **DigIQ** to show how confident citizens are in their own digital competence, the knowledge they have about digital media and technology use, and how they perform in this area. The monitor is divided into three main pages: [{{< iconify ph lightning-fill >}} Skills](skills.html), [{{< iconify ph book-open-fill >}} Knowledge](knowledge.html), and [{{< iconify ph clipboard-text >}} Performance](performance.html). {{< iconify ph cursor-click-fill >}} Click on the hyperlinks above for quick navigation. Under **Dimensions** you can find a description of the 11 domains of digital competence.
